articles.author: James McNicholas and Jay Harris
articles.title: Arsenal reach transfer agreement for Brentford goalkeeper David Raya - The Athletic
articles.description:
Arsenal have reached an agreement with Brentford for the signing of goalkeeper David Raya.
The north London club have agreed to pay in the region of £30million including add-ons for the services of the 27-year-old.
Raya is expected to sign a five-year deal un…
